name: Mara-Struck Soldier
description: Soldiers of the Xianzhou who somehow fell into madness. Their bodies continue to grow and mutate and have long lost their humanoid form. It is said that the long-lived Xianzhou natives would eventually be stricken with mara.

skills.name: Callous Tailwind
skills.description: Deals minor Wind DMG to a single target, with a high chance to inflict Wind Shear.

skills.name: Rejuvenate
skills.description: Upon receiving a killing blow, restores a certain amount of HP. This effect does not have a time limit but can be dispelled. This effect can only trigger 1 time per battle.

skills.name: Callous Tailwind
skills.description: Deals minor Wind DMG to a single target, with a high chance to inflict Wind Shear.
